title: Pink Wards, somebody help me!
body: Sometimes when I lay down a pink ward, it will desinagrate like 5 seconds later for reason, they just disapear! Can somebody tell me why this happens? and what I can do to prevent it? :) and on that note! Buy more wards people! :D

replies.body: This happened to me as well, and it made me think that placing a second pink ward cancelled the first. Haven't checked on that, anyone know?

Each player can only have 1 pink ward out at a time.
The OP's problem sounds more like a bug though.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dEogpcvL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-10T22:33:50.255+0000)
>
> Each player can only have 1 pink ward out at a time.
> The OP's problem sounds more like a bug though.

If that is so, then it seems a little odd that you can carry two pink wards.

This helps me out so much! As a Jg I buy pink wards all the time, usually in pairs (so two) and then I always see one disapear! I think I might be making the switch to blue wards now!
Thanks man :)
You're welcome.  They did that so you can't just flood the map with pinks to replace sight wards.

Everyone on the team should have pinks down at all times- place them in positions that are not normally traversed. Pinks provide TRUE vision  - you can see invis enemies with them 

They provide a larger area of vision.

If I play mid and we start on bottom of map, I place my vision ward just at the tip of the patch of grass that  is behind bluebuff at the spot that touches river. This gives you full vision to their river entrance, and behind the mid lane river entrace - If their jungler was to sweep the mid entrance they wouldnt know it was warded. 

If you can get your jungler to place his pink in the mirrored position on their side mid is completely safe from ganks.
